snippet: Workers at the General Motors plant in Kentucky that assembles Corvettes voted Tuesday to authorize a strike over lingering safety concerns, but a local union leader said he hopes the differences can be resolved without a walkout....

headline.print_headline: GM Auto Workers Vote to Allow Strike in Kentucky
headline.main: GM Auto Workers Vote to Allow Strike in Kentucky

lead_paragraph: Workers at the General Motors plant in Kentucky that assembles Corvettes voted Tuesday to authorize a strike over lingering safety concerns, but a local union leader said he hopes the differences can be resolved without a walkout.
